[Home](./index.md) &gt; [clm-core](./clm-core.md) &gt; [RelationBDTO](./clm-core.relationbdto.md)

## RelationBDTO class

Backend DTO for relations. Based on [RelationModel](./clm-core.relationmodel.md) The instance [relationBDTOInstance](./clm-core.relationbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RelationBDTO 
```
